name: Embrace of Winds
title: Venti: Embrace of Winds
inPlayDescription: After a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Stormzone created by your Venti who has this card equipped is triggered, the next <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack used by your character in this Round will cost 1 less <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Unaligned Element.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Venti to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Venti, equip this card.After Venti equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Skyward Sonnet once.After a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Stormzone created by your Venti, who has this card equipped, is triggered, the next <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attack performed by your character in this Round will cost 1 less <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Unaligned Element.(You must have Venti in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
